sections.section_title: About the PCI Security Standards Council

policies.policy_description: This policy outlines the requirements for access control to ensure the security of sensitive data.
policies.policy_text: All users must authenticate before accessing systems. Privileged accounts require multi-factor authentication. Access must be reviewed quarterly.
policies.scope: All entities involved in payment card processing
policies.objective: To ensure that all users have secure access to systems and data

subpolicies.subpolicy_description: This subpolicy outlines the requirements for user authentication.
subpolicies.subpolicy_text: All users must authenticate before accessing systems.

compliances.SectionTitle: About the PCI Security Standards Council
compliances.Description: All users must authenticate using multi-factor authentication before accessing sensitive systems, including those containing confidential data and intellectual property.
compliances.Notes: AI-generated from About the PCI Security Standards Council - Access Control Requirements
compliances.ComplianceTitle: Access Control Policy: Secure Authentication for Sensitive Systems
compliances.Scope: All systems containing sensitive data, confidential information, or intellectual property
compliances.Objective: To ensure secure access to sensitive systems by implementing multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all users

subpolicies.subpolicy_description: This subpolicy outlines the requirements for privileged account management.

compliances.SectionTitle: About the PCI Security Standards Council
compliances.Description: All users must authenticate using multi-factor authentication before accessing sensitive systems, including those containing confidential data and intellectual property.
compliances.Notes: AI-generated from About the PCI Security Standards Council - Access Control Requirements
compliances.ComplianceTitle: Access Control Policy: Secure Authentication for Sensitive Systems
compliances.Scope: All user accounts with access to sensitive systems, including database administrators, system administrators, and developers
compliances.Objective: To ensure that only authorized personnel have access to sensitive systems and data, thereby preventing unauthorized access and potential breaches.

subpolicies.subpolicy_description: This subpolicy outlines the requirements for access review.
